title: SASRec
description: SASRec stands for Self-Attentive Sequential Recommendation. It relies on the sequence modeling capabilities of self-attentive neural networks to predict the occurence of the next item in a userâ€™s consumption sequence. To be precise, given a user ğ‘¢ and their time-ordered consumption history $S^ğ‘¢ = (S1^u, S2^u, \dots, S_{|S^u|}^ğ‘¢),$ SASRec first applies self-attention on $S^ğ‘¢$ followed by a series of non-linear feed-forward layers to finally obtain the next item likelihood.
